data.oai_dc:dc: Farm-scale barnacle goose abundance and occurrence data
Data collected on the farm-scale abundance and occurrence of Greenland barnacle geese (Branta leucopsis) on Islay and associated environmental conditions, between 1998 and 2016.
barnacle geese|climate change|conservation conflict|goose conservation conflict|grass damage|habitat modification|human-wildlife conflict|population dynamics|spatial ecology
